original: Löfgren, Nik Edward (EDW), direktör, Halmstad, f. 18/3/72 i Laholm av Pehr L. o. Petronella Torbjörnsson. G. 02 m. Tora Synnerdahl. Barn: Nils f. 03, Märta 07. — Etabl. firma Löfgren & Jönsson partiaffär i kolonialvaror 95, ombild. firman t. A-B, dess verkst. dir. fr. 06. Led. av stadsfullm. 14-19, led. av styr. f. riksbank. avd :kont. i Halmstad, ordf. t. 43, fd. fullm. i Skånes hand :kamm., fd. led. av ett flert. ndr o. styr. Medl. av Frimurarorden, Odd Fellow^ o. W-Sex. RVO, RFinlVROlkl.
translated: Löfgren, Nik Edward (EDW), director, Halmstad, b. 18/3/72 in Laholm to Pehr L. and Petronella Torbjörnsson. M. 02 with Tora Synnerdahl. Children: Nils b. 03, Märta 07. - Established the company Löfgren & Jönsson, a wholesale business in colonial goods in 95, restructured the company to become a limited company, serving as its managing director from 06. Member of the municipal council from 14-19, member of the board of the local branch of the national bank in Halmstad, chairman from 43, former member of Skånes hand chamber, former member of several other committees and boards. Member of the Freemasons, Odd Fellows, and W-Sex. Recipient of the Order of the Polar Star, Knight of the Order of the White Rose of Finland, first class.

affiliation.name: Löfgren & Jönsson
affiliation.description: Formerly Löfgren & Jönsson partiaffär in kolonialvaror. Restructured to A-B (limited company) in an unknown year.

award.name: Order of the Polar Star
award.description: Recipient of the Order of the Polar Star

award.name: Knight of the Order of the White Rose of Finland
award.description: Recipient of the Knight of the Order of the White Rose of Finland, first class
